mapper.insert: insert into reservation(member_id, schedule_id, payment_id, adult, youth, date, status) values (#{member_id}, #{schedule_id}, #{payment_id}, #{adult}, #{youth}, #{date}, #{status})
mapper.update: update reservation set member_id=#{member_id}, schedule_id=#{schedule_id}, payment_id=#{payment_id}, adult=#{adult}, youth=#{youth}, date=#{date}, status=#{status}, where id=#{id}
